title: PENTI Learning Model Application Process for Enhancing Creative Thinking Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and collaborative learning experience
context.additional_context: Creative problem-solving competency enhancement program for professionals (medical/legal/technical) reflecting collaboration, auditing, and reconciliation values.

learning_goals: Learners can creatively solve complex problems in science fields by applying the five stages of the PENTI model (Gratitude-Conciliation-Collaboration-Mutual Support-Action)
Learners can implement three or more creative idea-generation processes through team-based collaboration in mobile microlearning environments
Learners can achieve a 20% or greater improvement in creative thinking scores measured against assessment rubric criteria
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
